description: This file defines a React component named BugCard used to display information about a bug, including title, status, severity, module, creation date, and description. It also includes helper functions for determining styling based on status and severity.

methods.name: statusColor
methods.description: Determines the text color class based on bug status ('Open', 'Resolved', or others).

methods.name: badgeColor
methods.description: Determines the badge background and text color class based on bug severity ('Critical', 'High', 'Medium', or others).

methods.name: BugCard
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled link containing bug details.
